I'm usually a fast eater but this place has taught me to slow down and savor the flavors. Each plate could be finished with one bite (don't worry there are many many plates) but the caveat is that you regret eating it so fast because it tasted soo good. The service was top notch and the molecular gastronomy style cooking was magic. Every dish was explained in detail by the waiters and presented in a unique style that paired perfectly with the taste. Nothing tasted like what we expected and we were delighted by each surprise. Definitely recommend trying this at least once and make sure to rsvp way before you plan to go.
